title: Hannah's Stolen Men
description: [Siren Menage Everlasting: Erotic Futuristic Sci-Fi Menage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, HEA] When Hannah Engels takes the place of Porter Jones and Edward Stafford's intended wife, she expects a little resentment at first, but for how long? Can the men eventually forgive her and give their family a chance on the new planet of Alpha, or will her deceit ruin their chance at love? Porter is willing to give the lady a chance, but Edward's past might get in the way of things. The three of them circle each other warily while trying to adjust to the new planet they have traveled to with all of its hidden dangers. They are all shocked to learn that the planet seems to be altering their cells, making their children become more than human. When Hannah immediately ends up pregnant, Edward is suspicious, hurting Hannah with his accusation. It's up to Porter to mend their broken fences and Hannah to give her stolen men another chance. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Marla Monroe
